business_identity.name: Remote Piano Recording
business_identity.tagline: Professional Piano Recording for Albums, Films & Soundtracks
business_identity.mission_statement: With over 20 years of professional experience, I provide world-class remote piano recording services for albums, films, and soundtracks. From intimate singer-songwriter projects to cinematic film scores, I deliver studio-quality recordings with the personal attention your music deserves. My home studio features premium instruments including grand piano, Hammond B3 organ, accordion, and vibraphone - rare combinations that set your project apart. Whether you need delicate classical piano, driving rock keyboards, soulful Hammond organ, atmospheric accordion textures, or shimmering vibraphone, I bring versatility, creativity, and decades of experience to every session. I've worked across every genre imaginable, from jazz and classical to pop, rock, country, and R&B. My approach combines technical excellence with musical sensitivity, ensuring each part serves the song. With fast turnaround times, unlimited revisions on premium packages, and complete pricing transparency, you know exactly what you're getting before you commit. I offer real-time virtual sessions using Audiomovers ListenTo technology, so we can work together as if we're in the same room. Every project receives MIDI files plus studio-quality audio, giving you maximum flexibility in post-production. From arranging to performance to mixing notes, I'm invested in making your music the best it can be.
business_identity.location: Available globally - Remote recording from professional home studio

specialty_instruments.name: Hammond B3 Organ Recording
specialty_instruments.description: The unmistakable sound of the Hammond B3 organ with Leslie speaker. From gospel grooves to jazz comping, rock power chords to soul ballads, the Hammond brings warmth, depth, and that inimitable swirl that only a real tonewheel organ can provide.
specialty_instruments.price: Included in session packages, or $200 standalone track
specialty_instruments.sound_character: Warm, thick, swirling. The Leslie speaker adds movement and dimension. Perfect for grooves, pads, and soulful chords.
when_to_use: When you need groove and pocket

specialty_instruments.name: Accordion Recording
specialty_instruments.description: Professional piano accordion for folk, world music, tango, polka, French musette, and cinematic textures. Accordion brings unique emotional character - nostalgic, playful, dramatic, or ethereal depending on how it's played. Increasingly popular in indie and film music for its distinctive voice.
specialty_instruments.price: Included in session packages, or $225 standalone track
specialty_instruments.sound_character: Breathy, expressive, nostalgic. Bellows dynamics add human breathing quality. Can be delicate or driving.
modern_uses: Indie folk (Beirut, Arcade Fire, Neutral Milk Hotel)

specialty_instruments.name: Vibraphone Recording
specialty_instruments.description: 4-octave professional vibraphone with motor control for that signature shimmering, ethereal sound. The vibraphone occupies a unique sonic space - percussive but melodic, bright but warm, rhythmic but atmospheric. Perfect for jazz, film scores, ambient music, and dream pop textures.
specialty_instruments.price: Included in session packages, or $250 standalone track
specialty_instruments.sound_character: Shimmering, bell-like, ethereal. Sustain and motor vibrato create dreamy, floating quality. Natural reverb from resonators.
when_to_use: Dream pop shimmer (Cocteau Twins, Beach House)

genres_expertise.description: Intimate, supportive piano that enhances vocals without competing. I specialize in creating space, using dynamics and restraint to serve the song. Fingerpicking patterns, delicate arpeggios, and tasteful chord voicings that feel organic and emotional.
genres_expertise.approach: Less is more. Every note serves the lyric and vocal. Focus on dynamics, space, and emotional resonance.

genres_expertise.description: Modern production piano: bright, present, and rhythmic. Layering acoustic piano with synths and electric piano for contemporary radio sound. Driving eighth-note patterns, rhythmic stabs, and ear-candy fills that make choruses pop.
genres_expertise.experience: 30+ pop albums, singles, and radio releases
genres_expertise.approach: Rhythm-first piano that locks with drums. Bright, compressed, and forward in the mix. Modern production techniques.

genres_expertise.description: Authentic jazz voicings, walking bass lines, comping, and improvisation. Both traditional and contemporary jazz styles. Understanding of form, swing feel, and the art of accompaniment. Can comp behind soloists or take featured piano solos.
genres_expertise.experience: 20+ years performing and recording jazz professionally
genres_expertise.approach: Voice-led comping, interactive playing, authentic swing and feel. Can work from lead sheets or create arrangements.

genres_expertise.description: Conservatory-trained performance of composed parts or original arrangements in classical and neoclassical styles. From Baroque to Romantic repertoire, to contemporary minimalist and cinematic neoclassical.
genres_expertise.approach: Technically precise yet emotionally expressive. Understanding of classical form, phrasing, and dynamics.

genres_expertise.description: Emotional, story-driven piano for film, TV, and games. From intimate solo piano to epic orchestral accompaniment. Understanding of scoring to picture, emotional arc, and how music serves narrative. Experience with drama, comedy, thriller, and documentary scoring.
genres_expertise.experience: 15+ films scored or piano recorded for feature films and documentaries
genres_expertise.approach: Music serves the story. Understanding of spotting, themes, and emotional beats. Can work to locked picture or rough cuts.
genres_expertise.price_range: $600-$2,000 per cue depending on length and complexity

genres_expertise.description: Driving, rhythmic piano and keyboard parts for rock and alternative music. From classic rock piano to modern indie rock textures. Rhodes, Wurlitzer, Hammond organ, and synth sounds. Locking with drums and bass to create powerful grooves.
genres_expertise.approach: Energy and attitude. Piano as a rhythm section instrument. Not afraid to be aggressive and present in the mix.

genres_expertise.description: Honky-tonk piano, barroom styles, and modern Nashville production techniques. From traditional country to contemporary Americana and roots music. Understanding of the Nashville sound and modern country radio production.
genres_expertise.approach: Tasteful and supportive. Country piano walks the line between traditional and modern. Groove is everything.

genres_expertise.description: Rhodes, Wurlitzer, B3 organ, and piano for R&B and soul music. Soulful chord progressions, groove-oriented playing, and understanding of the pocket. From classic Motown to modern neo-soul and alternative R&B.
genres_expertise.approach: Feel and groove above all. Locked with the rhythm section. Emphasis on Rhodes, Wurlitzer, and Hammond.

competitive_advantages.vs_individual_competitors: Broader genre experience (albums + film + jazz + classical). Rare specialty instruments (accordion, vibraphone). Complete pricing transparency. Faster turnaround. Modern, informative website.
competitive_advantages.vs_local_studios: Convenience - no travel required. Lower cost - no studio overhead. Same professional quality. Flexible scheduling. Work at your own pace.
competitive_advantages.unique_instrument_combo: Very few session musicians offer piano + Hammond + accordion + vibraphone. This combination makes you stand out significantly.

pricing_transparency.philosophy: Clear, upfront pricing with no hidden fees. You know exactly what you're paying before you commit.
